verbs.description: June 15 , 2016 : [ARGM-TMP: During a campaign stop in Atlanta , Georgia] , [ARG0: candidate Donald trump] [V: slammed] [ARG1: the cost of the president hosting state dinners at the White House , as well as the use of party tents over an official ballroom] – [ARGM-ADV: for which he offered to pay “ 100 percent of the cost] . ”

June 15 , 2016 : During a campaign stop in Atlanta , Georgia , candidate Donald trump slammed the cost of [ARG0: the president] [V: hosting] [ARG1: state dinners at the White House] , as well as the use of party tents over an official ballroom – for which he offered to pay “ 100 percent of the cost . ”

June 15 , 2016 : During a campaign stop in Atlanta , Georgia , candidate Donald trump slammed the cost of the president hosting state dinners at the White House , as well as the use of party tents over an official ballroom – for which [ARG0: he] [V: offered] [ARG1: to pay “ 100 percent of the cost] . ”

June 15 , 2016 : During a campaign stop in Atlanta , Georgia , candidate Donald trump slammed the cost of the president hosting state dinners at the White House , as well as the use of party tents over an official ballroom – for which [ARG0: he] offered to [V: pay] “ [ARG1: 100 percent of the cost] . ”
